notes: Successive attacks with Mage Slayer do not stack the debuff, but refresh the duration instead.
The attacks first apply the debuff, then their own damage.
Does not work against wards, buildings, and allied units.
Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell damage reduction and amplification.
abilities.description: Places a debuff when you attack enemies, causing them to do 35% less spell damage for 4 seconds.

additionalInformation: For strength heroes, it grants 20% magic resistance, 3.33 armor, 20 attack speed and 20 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 20% magic resistance, 3.33 armor, 20 attack speed and 40 attack damage.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 20% magic resistance, 3.33 armor, 20 attack speed and 20 attack damage.
name: Mage Slayer
description: Forged by a secret order in The Third Age of Praxa'cia to fell the False King.
